attributes.additional_details:
I have always felt that ,as motorist we are all at some greater risk whilst driving under road bridges. It really frightens me, whenever I am on the roads, and I can see people loitering on road bridges.

Bridges are necessary but dangerous places, and it should not be so easy for someone to hurl themself off a bridge, into the path of moving vehicles. It should not be as easy to hurl things over the edge of a bridge.

In my estimation,for this to happen once,would be once too often,however this happens time and again,
and I think its time the matter was looked into, with a view to doing something about the existing situation.

My campaign seeks to bring this matter to the attention  of:-

1. The Government Department,with the responsibility
for Bridges.

2. To see how many people feel as strongly as I do about this matter.

3. To propose some form of Safety Netting along the edge of Bridges and Flyovers.
